spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Area 2 - Exterior - Outer Hub
Area 4 - West - Transport to Area 5 Entrance
Area 8 - Shaft East
spoiler_log.Ice Beam: Area 3 - Interior (East) - Transport to Area 3 Interior West
spoiler_log.Lightning Armor: Area 2 - Entrance - Transport to Area 2 Exterior
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Area 3 - Interior (West) - Shaft East
Area 4 - East - Diggernaut Chase Room
spoiler_log.Progressive Jump:
Area 1 - Ice Beam Room
Area 2 - Entrance - Transport to Area 2 Exterior
spoiler_log.Aeion Reserve Tank: Area 3 - Interior (West) - Transport to Area 3 Exterior (Upper)

hints.text: A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 2 - Exterior.
The Baby Metroid can be found in Area 2 - Interior.
A Progressive Jump can be found in Area 2 - Entrance.
A Progressive Jump can be found in Area 1.
The Beam Burst can be found in Area 4 - East.
The Super Missile can be found in Area 3 - Exterior.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 4 - West.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 8.
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 3 - Interior (West).
An Energy Tank can be found in Area 3 - Interior (East).
